description: Gregg From Night in the Woods
Gregg From Night in the Woods
A Patchwork cardigan that took me a year to make! 50 patches, 8 with their own unique symbols

A Patchwork cardigan that took me a year to make! 50 patches, 8 with their own unique symbols. There's an Anarchist A, a hammer and sickle, The nonbinary / gender anarchy symbol, my pronouns embroidered "THEY/THEM", A Pentagram, a skull and crossbones aplique, a furry pawprint, and 27 tactile Braille dots spelling out the word Persevere.
Mweep Mworp! It's a red Pikmin. I got a little obsessed with Pikmin Bloom when I needed to walk the dog every day!
A WIP Shawl I might never get around to finishing up
A Covid-Era Mask with filter. The first thing I ever  crocheted
A tinsy Luma Mario Power Star!
A magical winged strawberry from the game Celeste
A very janky raccoon I freehanded for my roommate's birthday!
A very janky raccoon I freehanded for my roommate's birthday!
My first Amigarumi! It's a colorful rat named Cantrip
My first Amigarumi! It's a colorful rat named Cantrip
A janky Baby Yoda in a very stylish robe. Christmas present from my Star Wars fanboy brother!
